song.title: Broom Broom
song.info:
Winner of the Revision 2016 Streaming Music competition.
Hotel Continental, I was holding up the bar He was holding up the traffic like some old-time movie star I walked right through his entourage and gave him my best line He flashed his car keys back at me and said "your place or mine?"
Broom broom, we were in his car Broom broom, I said "is it far?" Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom
Mercedes-Benz from '63, shiny chrome and black With honey-coloured leather seats, the kind that go right back Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom
My hand caressed his gearstick; I had him in a fever I smiled and said "there must be fifty ways to love your lever" I pushed his button, flicked his switch, I took it to the limit He handled every single curve at sixty miles a minute
Broom broom, we were in his room Bang bang, na na, at speed of light Car keys, yes please, I'll be needing these Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom
Mercedes-Benz from '63, shiny chrome and black With honey-coloured leather seats, the kind that go right back Broom broom, now I'm in MY car Broom broom, like a movie star Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom Broom broom, bang bang, boom boom
